plot: In an attempt to salvage their relationship, a young couple go away on a romantic weekend, but the beauty of their surroundings does nothing to help them see past each others mistakes.
title: Residue
plot_es: In an attempt to salvage their relationship, a young couple go away on a romantic weekend, but the beauty of their surroundings does nothing to help them see past each others mistakes.
plot_en: In an attempt to salvage their relationship, a young couple go away on a romantic weekend, but the beauty of their surroundings does nothing to help them see past each others mistakes.
